Name: Block_Quotes
Brooklyn Heights: [" Just minutes from a variety of trains, offering one-stop access to Manhattan. It's also close to hip shopping and dining districts on Smith Street, Court Street and Atlantic Avenue. Not to mention, ever-improving Brooklyn Bridge Park, which offers great playgrounds, volleyball courts and a walkway to DUMBO and the old waterfront."]

Name: Lede
Brooklyn Heights: Brooklyn Heights immaculate brownstones and well-tended trees lend it an air of stately regality. Although this neighborhoods fine establishments cater to those with classic tastes, you dont have to be an expert sommelier or studied connoisseur to enjoy Brooklyn Heights rustic architecture, waterfront real estate, and breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline.

Name: Intro
Brooklyn Heights: Get your fill of luxury living in one of Brooklyn's classiest neighborhoods.

Name: Photo_Captions
Brooklyn Heights: ["Brooklyn Heights is like Manhattan's Upper East Side.", 'Prestigious brownstones and regal elegance characterize the neighborhood.', "Brooklyn Heights' bistros and boutiques exude casual warmth and modern panache.", 'Some of the best views Brooklyn has to offer can be seen from the boardwalk in Brooklyn Heights.', "Residents gather in its community spaces to enjoy stunning views of Manhattan's skyline or jog along the river at sunset."]
